Brazilian Amphibian Species List Dataset

Fonte: R/data.R
Segalla_2021.Rd

A dataset of the official Brazilian Amphibian Species List publish by the Brazilian Herpetological Society (SBH).

Usage

Segalla_2021

Formato

Segalla_2021

A data frame with 1,188 rows and 8 columns:

species_id

Id of species in list

order

Taxonomic Order

family

Taxonomic Family

subfamily

Taxonomic Family

genus

Genus

epithet

Specifc epithet

species

Scientific name

author

Authorship of original description

...

Fonte

https://zenodo.org/record/4716176
